entry.value: # Copy input to output%%00010import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010output_table = input_table.copy()%%00010%%00010output_store = pd.DataFrame()%%00010%%00010input_df = pd.DataFrame(input_table)%%00010%%00010# Rule Engine to create column "prediction"%%00010input_df['prediction'] = input_df.apply(lambda x: 'TRUE' if (x['Country'] == 'EU total') and (x['Sum[MtC/yr]'] < -0.3) else 'FALSE', axis=1)%%00010%%00010country_list = list(input_df.Country.unique())%%00010%%00010for counter, country_name in enumerate(country_list):%%00010%%00009one_country_df = input_df[input_df['Country'] == country_name]%%00010%%00009one_country_df = one_country_df.set_index('Years')%%00010%%00009one_country_df['prediction'] = input_df[input_df['Country'] == "EU total"].prediction.values%%00010%%00010%%00009values_to_fill = one_country_df[one_country_df['prediction'] == "FALSE"].values%%00010%%00009one_country_df[one_country_df['prediction'] == "TRUE"] = values_to_fill[-1,:]%%00010%%00010%%00009one_country_df['Years'] = np.arange(1990,2101)%%00010%%00010%%00009output_store = pd.concat([output_store, one_country_df],axis=0,ignore_index=True)%%00010%%00010output_table = output_store.copy()
